item.title: K-9 Mail 6.200 Supports OAuth 2.0 (gmail)
item.description: K-9 Mail 6.200 is released on 2022/07/08, it add the support to OAuth 2.0. Before it, if you activated the 2-factor verification on your Google account, when you try to use K-9 mail to connect to Gmail, you need to use App Passwords. It's not convenient, you can reference https://ekiwi-blog.de/en/16841/ to check the detail with a step-by-step video. In K-9 Mail 6.200 release, it supports for using OAuth 2.0 with Google, Yahoo, AOL, and personal Microsoft accounts (Office365 accounts are not supported yet).
